name: Cat Game - Animation Example
description:
The game is an example, showing how the following cat set works:Game for an example of cat animation work:

https://starbreak.itch.io/one-cat Character control

Attack: Left mouse click.

Movement: Key "D" and Key "D".

jump: "SPASE".

Run:  "SHIFT".

Sit down: Key "C".

Lie down: Twice Key "C".

Sleep: Three times Key "C".

Stand Up: Key "W".
